description: CSS file for managing themes and styles of a React application, including light and dark themes as well as component styling.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container that styles the layout and typography based on theme variables.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header component styled for the application with background and text color adaptable to the theme.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling compatible with the theme variables for consistent design.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes with style transitions.
